author: Stephanie Ebbs
title: Power company workers sequester in the office during COVID-19 crisis
description: To keep the lights on, some power companies sequester employees at work to protect them from COVID19.
content:
Think how much worse this coronavirus crisis would be if the power went out.
Thats one of the reasons utility operators, the people who run your electricity service, are taking steps to sequester employees in offices, power stations, and control rooms to kee… [+3447 chars]
